original_text: Who against hope believed in hope, that he might become the father of many nations, according to that which was spoken, So shall thy seed be.
korean_text: 아브라함이 바랄 수 없는 중에 바라고 믿었으니 이는 네 후손이 이같으리라 하신 말씀대로 많은 민족의 조상이 되게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: Who against hope believed in hope
sentences.korean_translation: 소망이 없는 가운데 소망을 믿은 그는

sentences.original_text: that he might become the father of many nations
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 민족의 아버지가 되게 하기 위하여

sentences.original_text: according to that which was spoken
